channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.18 (Build 20260107.3)
item.description:
What's New

feat: Add Injection Test feature with force override and improved Spotlight detection

  • Add comprehensive Injection Test section in Debug View
  • Support force override for injection method, text sending method, and delays
  • Add detailed AX element info logging for debugging
  • Improve Spotlight detection using AXIdentifier (more reliable than placeholder)
  • Add AX Direct method option to Window Title Rules
  • Update InjectionMethod with displayName and description properties

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
